title: Notification sound different instead of default sound for different apps
content:
I am trying to have my apps have different notification sounds example, Snapchat with its original ping, sports with the ESPN da da da famous sound.
The thing is, I can't find it in my settings for the phone not can find it in the app settings. I just would rather not have the default for all of my apps. What should I do?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
